title: Episode 62: Desperate Measures
itunes:title: Episode 62: Desperate Measures
description:
Folklore and medicine often go hand in hand. In fact, for a long time they were the very same thing. But folklore has a way of leading people to tragic actions—all in the name of getting better.

* * *

This episode of Lore was sponsored by:

Loot Crate: LootCrate is a box of pop culture collectibles—housewares, pins, t-shirts, and collectables—packaged around a theme and delivered to your door every month for just $20. It’s the best surprise you know is coming! June's theme is “ALTER EGO”, and includes exclusive items from Spider-Man, Transformers, The Hulk, and DC Comics. Visit LootCrate.com/lore to sign up by 9PM Pacific on June 19th to get this amazing crate. Plus, use the coupon code LORE at check-out to save $3 off your new subscription.

The Great Courses Plus: Hundreds of topics taught by professors and experts, all in one enormous video library. Visit TheGreatCoursesPlus.com/lore to start your free trial membership — and gain unlimited access to their entire lecture library, including my recommendation: The Black Death: The World's Most Devastating Plague.

Stamps.com: Print your own postage and shipping labels from your home or office. Start your 4-week trial today, and claim your $110 bonus offer, which includes postage, a digital scale, and zero commitment. Just visit Stamps.com, click on the microphone in the top-right of the homepage, and type LORE.

* * *

Official Lore Merchandise: www.lorepodcast.com/shop

Extra member episodes: www.patreon.com/lorepodcast

Novels by Aaron Mahnke: www.aaronmahnke.com/novels

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Access premium content!: https://www.patreon.com/lorepodcast

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
